Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; dot band between pairs of bands in added white; exterior: painted decoration consisting of lion (mane, shoulder with red patch and row of dots on underbelly remaining) to left.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 259, no. 502, pl. 67)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0492) (phase 2)
